subject: Missing plate
description_text:
I orderded a black Plate with the second smaller Plate on AliExpress but
the small Plate was not in the package.

Order number was : 3057696368349782

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Karrasch,  The items were shipped separately, and the base plate has not arrived yet. Please be patient.

I have now both packages and the small Plate isnt in the other there were
only the Pedals

service@simsonn.com

So this Plate is still missing, i already wrote a lot on AliExpress and
they Said i should wrote Here


service@simsonn.com
Hi Michael Karrasch,    I have just informed the operations team, and they will send you a replacement base plate next Monday. Please don’t worry.
